sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { public alerts: any[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private route: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); if (token) { // Token istnieje - przekieruj użytkownika na "/alert/all" this.router.navigate(['/alert/all']); } else { // Token nie istnieje - przekieruj użytkownika na "/login" this.router.navigate(['/login']); } this.route.params.subscribe(params => { this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/alert/all').subscribe( res => this.alerts = res, err => console.log('Error: ', err) ) }) } }
